#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int n;
    long long a[101],s[1024],c[1024],v;
    int x = 18;
    while(scanf("%d",&n) != EOF){
        for(int i = 0;i < 1024; ++i)
            s[i] = 0,c[i] = 0;
        for(int i = 0;i < n; ++i){
            scanf("%lld",&v);
            a[i] = v;
            int mx = 0;
            while(v){
                mx |= (1<<(v%10));
                v /= 10;
            }
            if(s[mx] < a[i]){
                s[mx] = a[i];
                c[mx] = 1;
            }
        }
        for(int i = 0;i < 1024; ++i){
            for(int j = 0;j < i; ++j){
                if((j^(i - j)) != i)
                    continue;
                if(s[i] < (s[j] + s[i - j])){
                    s[i] = s[j] + s[i - j];
                    c[i] = c[j] + c[i - j];
                }
                else if(s[i] == (s[j] + s[i - j]) && c[i] < (c[j] + c[i - j]))
                    c[i] = c[j] + c[i - j];

            }
        }
        long long mx = 0,sx = 0;
        for(int i = 0;i < 1024; ++i){
            if(s[i] > sx){
                    sx = s[i];
                    mx = c[i];
            }
            else if(s[i] == sx && c[i] > mx)
                mx = c[i];

        }
        printf("%lld\n",mx);
    }

}
